attributes.action: set the salary of all cabinet positions to equate to no more than the average UK worker's wage for the previous year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The average worker's pay in the UK in 05/06 according to the ONS was £23,600.

In the same year, The Rt Hon Anthony Blair recieved a salary of £187,611

The oft-cited argument that a prime minister works longer hours than others, or that that salary is nessecary for expenses falls flat in today's competitive work environment.

In order to encourage our leaders to improve our every day lives, we believe they should be tied to them. When we prosper, they prosper, and vice versa.

As cabinet members are entirely dedicated to public service (or so they claim), this petition should face no resistance.

Fairness for the governed means fairness from the government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
